topics.body: Christ on a cracker; today I learned about a anime called, "my little sister can't be this cute".  There's a reason why I read reviews and articles on anime before watching them cause I read how it ends and I have the distinct feeling it made everyone riot.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542f587463687263444b0000#post_542f587463687263444b0000
Does it end with HORRIBLE CRUSHING depression?

Also. It's not a porno?! I thought for sure it was a porno.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Princessâ™ Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542f5d2b636872045bf70000#post_542f5d2b636872045bf70000
[spoiler]The story in a nutshell is the main character romantically likes his sister; the series ends with them getting together, but at the last second turns out they were pretending to be a couple and they go their own ways.

Basically the reason why people hate the ending is that the series gives the watchers the fanservice they were hoping for then yanks it away at the last second just so they could jump the shark and get higher views from the fan pandering.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542f5f6d6368726adcf10100#post_542f5f6d6368726adcf10100
[spoiler] sounds less like pandering and more like the biggest *FUCK YOU* from a writer since the ending of Saint Elsewhere.[/spoiler]
